p: Mouse macrophages RAW 264.7 (American Type Culture Collection, ATCC ® TIB-71™) and murine fibroblasts (L929 cell line, ATCC ®-CCL1™) (Cell Line Service, Brazil) were maintained in Dulbecco's modified Eagle's medium (DMEM) supplemented with 10% fetal bovine serum (FBS), 100 IU/mL penicillin, and 100 µg/mL streptomycin, at 37°C, in a humidified atmosphere containing 5% CO 2 (all Sigma, USA).
